FAQs.question: How do I reset my account password?
FAQs.answer: You can reset your password by clicking on the Account section. From there, select the option menu, and you'll find the Password Change option.

FAQs.question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
FAQs.answer: You can reset your password from the Account section by selecting the option menu and choosing the Password Change option.

FAQs.question: Where can I find how many flights I have booked?
FAQs.answer: You can view your booked flights from the Account section located at the top middle section.

FAQs.question: How do I see my previous flight bookings?
FAQs.answer: You can view your flight history by visiting the Account section on the top of the screen.

FAQs.question: Where can I check the refund policy for my flight?
FAQs.answer: You can view the refund policy for a flight once you've added the flight to your cart.

FAQs.question: Is there a way to see refund rules before booking?
FAQs.answer: Yes, refund policies are visible once you successfully add a flight to the cart.

FAQs.question: How can I check the commission for a flight booking?
FAQs.answer: To view the commission of a flight, simply click on the 'More Info' button after adding the flight to your cart.

FAQs.question: Where can I find commission details for a booking?
FAQs.answer: Commission details are visible after adding the flight to your cart and clicking on the 'More Info' button.

FAQs.question: I'm facing issues selecting a flight. What should I do?
FAQs.answer: If you're facing any issue while booking, you can either report it on the Feedback page or contact our Customer Support team.

FAQs.question: Flight selection page is not working. Help!
FAQs.answer: If you're experiencing issues while selecting a flight, please report it through the Feedback page or contact our Customer Support.

FAQs.question: Why are fewer flights showing up on the booking page?
FAQs.answer: Due to continuous updates in flight availability, sudden changes may occur causing fewer flights to appear.

FAQs.question: Flights are missing on the booking page. What happened?
FAQs.answer: Flight listings can vary due to ongoing updates and changes in flight availability.

FAQs.question: Why can't I book an NDC flight?
FAQs.answer: You might not be able to book NDC flights because the NDC servers are experiencing heavy traffic. Try again after some time or contact Support.

FAQs.question: NDC flight is not showing up. What can I do?
FAQs.answer: It’s likely due to server rush. Please try after some time or reach out to our support team for assistance.

FAQs.question: How can I access my Dashboard?
FAQs.answer: To navigate to the Dashboard, click on your Username, then select 'Dashboard' from the dropdown menu.

FAQs.question: Where is the Dashboard option?
FAQs.answer: Click your Username at the top, a dropdown will appear. Select 'Dashboard' to navigate.

FAQs.question: How do I change the language setting?
FAQs.answer: To change the language, click the top right button next to the username and select your preferred language.

FAQs.question: Can I switch the language on the booking site?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you can switch languages from the top right button near your username.

FAQs.question: How can I book flights faster?
FAQs.answer: To speed up booking, use the 'Search with AI' option available on the booking page.

FAQs.question: Tips for quicker flight booking?
FAQs.answer: Use the 'Search with AI' feature to increase booking efficiency and find flights faster.

FAQs.question: One-way flights are not showing. Why?
FAQs.answer: This can happen if the selected flight is incompatible or no one-way flights are available at the moment. Please try again later.

FAQs.question: I can't see one-way flight options. What should I do?
FAQs.answer: Check your departure and arrival airports and the selected date. If still unavailable, try again after some time.

FAQs.question: How do I add a layover between flights?
FAQs.answer: To add a layover, either search using text format with Smart Search AI or use the 'Advance Options' button on the Manual Search page.

FAQs.question: Is it possible to customize layovers?
FAQs.answer: Yes! Search your flight mentioning layover airports via Smart Search AI, or manually use the 'Advance Options' while searching.

FAQs.question: How can I update my personal details like email?
FAQs.answer: To update personal details, click your Username > select 'Dashboard' from the dropdown > Edit your information.

FAQs.question: Where to update my phone number or email?
FAQs.answer: Click on your Username, go to 'Dashboard', and edit your details as needed.

FAQs.question: Can I book multiple flights together?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you can add multiple flights to the cart and book them one by one.

FAQs.question: Is it possible to book several flights at once?
FAQs.answer: Yes, add multiple flights to your cart and complete the booking one after the other.

FAQs.question: How do I apply a promo code?
FAQs.answer: You can apply a promo code during manual search. Two highlighted red buttons on the first page will help you avail discounts.

FAQs.question: Where do I enter a discount coupon?
FAQs.answer: You can enter promo codes during the manual search process by clicking on the highlighted red buttons.

FAQs.question: I didn’t get a booking confirmation. What now?
FAQs.answer: It might take some time for confirmation. If still pending, please contact Customer Support.

FAQs.question: Booking pending for too long. Help!
FAQs.answer: If your booking confirmation is delayed, reach out to Customer Support for immediate assistance.

FAQs.question: How can I check my flight status?
FAQs.answer: To view your flight status, click on the 'My Booking' option at the top bar.

FAQs.question: Where to track flight schedule updates?
FAQs.answer: Flight status and schedule updates are available under the 'My Booking' section.

FAQs.question: What happens if my flight is canceled?
FAQs.answer: If your flight gets canceled, the refund process will initiate if it was a refundable booking. Check 'My Booking' to confirm refund eligibility.

FAQs.question: Flight got canceled. Will I get a refund?
FAQs.answer: Refunds are initiated for refundable flights if canceled. Confirm if your flight was refundable under 'My Booking'.

FAQs.question: Can I modify my flight after booking?
FAQs.answer: Yes, if the airline allows it. You can request modifications by contacting Customer Support or checking 'My Bookings'.

FAQs.question: How do I cancel my flight?
FAQs.answer: You can cancel your flight by navigating to 'My Bookings' and selecting the cancel option if available.

FAQs.question: Will I get full refund on cancellation?
FAQs.answer: Full refunds are only applicable for refundable flights. Check your flight type under 'My Bookings'.

FAQs.question: Can I change the passenger name after booking?
FAQs.answer: Name changes depend on airline policies. Please contact our Customer Support for further assistance.

FAQs.question: How do I add extra baggage to my booking?
FAQs.answer: After booking, visit 'My Bookings' and select the option to add extra baggage if the airline supports it.

FAQs.question: Is travel insurance included?
FAQs.answer: Travel insurance is optional. You can add it during the booking process when available.

FAQs.question: How to add insurance to my flight?
FAQs.answer: You can add travel insurance while booking your flight. Look for the 'Add Insurance' option before final payment.

FAQs.question: Can I choose seats during booking?
FAQs.answer: Seat selection is possible for most airlines. You'll find the option while booking or under 'My Bookings' post-booking.

FAQs.question: Is there a way to select my preferred seat?
FAQs.answer: Yes, during booking or via 'My Bookings' if the airline allows it.

FAQs.question: How can I book flights for multiple passengers?
FAQs.answer: During flight search, simply add more passengers in the 'Add Passengers' option before searching flights.

FAQs.question: Is group booking available?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you can book flights for multiple people at once. Add all passengers' details during booking.

FAQs.question: Can I book round-trip tickets?
FAQs.answer: Yes! You can select 'Round Trip' option during flight search.

FAQs.question: How to book a round trip?
FAQs.answer: Choose the 'Round Trip' option at the start of your flight search and enter both departure and return details.

FAQs.question: Do you offer last-minute bookings?
FAQs.answer: Yes, last-minute bookings are available based on airline availability. Use 'Search with AI' for quick booking.

FAQs.question: Are there discounts on last-minute flights?
FAQs.answer: Sometimes! You can find last-minute deals by using promo codes during the manual search process.

FAQs.question: Where can I find flight deals and offers?
FAQs.answer: Flight deals and offers are highlighted on the homepage or during manual search. Keep an eye for promo banners!

FAQs.question: How do I find cheaper flights?
FAQs.answer: Use flexible dates while searching and check our 'Deals' section available during manual search.

FAQs.question: How to get notifications for flight discounts?
FAQs.answer: Turn on notification alerts in your Account Settings to receive latest discounts and offers.

FAQs.question: Is my payment secure on the platform?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we use encrypted and secure payment gateways to ensure your transactions are safe.

FAQs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
FAQs.answer: We accept major Credit Cards, Debit Cards, Net Banking, and Wallets depending on your country.

FAQs.question: Can I pay in installments?
FAQs.answer: Currently, installment payment options depend on your card provider. Check during checkout.

FAQs.question: Will I get an invoice after booking?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you will automatically receive an invoice on your registered email after booking confirmation.

FAQs.question: How can I download my flight ticket?
FAQs.answer: You can download your ticket from the 'My Bookings' section once the booking is confirmed.

FAQs.question: Can I change my destination after booking?
FAQs.answer: Changing destination after booking is subject to airline rules. Contact Customer Support for help.

FAQs.question: Can I add hotel booking along with flights?
FAQs.answer: Currently, we specialize in flights only. Stay tuned for hotel booking services in the future!

FAQs.question: Can I check baggage policy before booking?
FAQs.answer: Yes, baggage allowance is mentioned under the 'More Info' button when you add a flight to your cart.

FAQs.question: Can I upgrade my class after booking?
FAQs.answer: Class upgrades depend on airline policies. Contact Customer Support to know if your flight is eligible.

FAQs.question: Is customer support available 24x7?
FAQs.answer: Our Customer Support is available 24x7 to assist you with any queries.

FAQs.question: Can I request a special meal for my flight?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you can request a special meal during booking if the airline offers it, or update via 'My Bookings'.

FAQs.question: Where to enter my frequent flyer number?
FAQs.answer: You can enter your frequent flyer number during passenger information entry in the booking process.

FAQs.question: Do I earn frequent flyer miles booking here?
FAQs.answer: Yes, if you add your frequent flyer number during booking, miles will be credited as per airline policy.

FAQs.question: Can I save traveler profiles for faster booking?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you can save traveler profiles under 'Account Settings' for quick future bookings.

FAQs.question: Do you offer student discounts?
FAQs.answer: Student discounts depend on airlines. Look for special fare options during search or contact Support.

FAQs.question: Are there senior citizen discounts?
FAQs.answer: Some airlines offer senior citizen discounts. Check under 'More Info' after adding flight to your cart.

FAQs.question: Can I get GST invoice for business travel?
FAQs.answer: Yes, provide your GST details during booking to receive a GST-compliant invoice.

FAQs.question: Can I resend booking confirmation email?
FAQs.answer: Yes, go to 'My Bookings' and click on 'Resend Email' option if you haven't received it.

FAQs.question: Is there a mobile app available for booking?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you can book flights easily via our mobile app available on Android and iOS stores.

FAQs.question: What if I miss my flight?
FAQs.answer: If you miss your flight, airline rules will apply. Contact Customer Support immediately for assistance.

FAQs.question: How do I contact Customer Support?
FAQs.answer: Click on the 'Help' section or use the 'Contact Support' button available at the bottom of every page.

FAQs.question: How do I change my travel date after booking?
FAQs.answer: You can change your travel date through 'My Bookings', subject to airline policies and change fees.

FAQs.question: What should I do if the website crashes during payment?
FAQs.answer: Don't worry! Check your email for booking confirmation. If none received, retry booking or contact support.

FAQs.question: How can I apply corporate discounts during booking?
FAQs.answer: You can apply corporate discounts via the 'Promo Code' option on the manual search page.

FAQs.question: Can I request wheelchair assistance?
FAQs.answer: Yes, during booking you can request special assistance or mention it to Customer Support post-booking.

FAQs.question: How do I rebook a canceled flight?
FAQs.answer: You can rebook a canceled flight via 'My Bookings' or search for a new flight manually.

FAQs.question: Can I make partial payment for a booking?
FAQs.answer: Currently, partial payment is not supported. Full payment is needed to confirm your booking.

FAQs.question: How to change my billing address for a booking?
FAQs.answer: You can update your billing address under 'Account Settings' before finalizing payment.

FAQs.question: Is there an option to select multi-city flights?
FAQs.answer: Yes! Select 'Multi-City' option on the search page and add multiple legs to your trip.

FAQs.question: How do I check layover durations during booking?
FAQs.answer: Layover duration details are shown in the flight options once you view 'More Info' after adding to cart.

FAQs.question: What happens if there is a schedule change in my flight?
FAQs.answer: You will be notified by email and SMS. Check 'My Bookings' for updated timings.

FAQs.question: Can I cancel only one leg of a round-trip booking?
FAQs.answer: Depends on the airline policy. Contact Customer Support to explore options.

FAQs.question: How do I know if a flight is refundable before booking?
FAQs.answer: Refundability is mentioned under 'More Info' for each flight once you add it to your cart.

FAQs.question: What documents are needed during airport check-in?
FAQs.answer: You need a valid government-issued ID and your flight ticket (print or digital).

FAQs.question: Can I receive SMS updates for my flight?
FAQs.answer: Yes, ensure your phone number is updated correctly during booking for SMS notifications.

FAQs.question: What if I enter wrong passenger information?
FAQs.answer: Immediately contact Customer Support. Corrections depend on airline rules and time left before flight.

FAQs.question: Can I add a pet to my booking?
FAQs.answer: Pet policies vary by airline. Contact Customer Support before booking to assist you.

FAQs.question: How do I redeem loyalty points?
FAQs.answer: Currently, loyalty point redemption is supported through select airlines. Add your membership number during booking.

FAQs.question: Can I get a refund if I miss my connecting flight?
FAQs.answer: If flights are booked under one PNR and delay is airline's fault, refund or rebooking may be offered.

FAQs.question: Is visa assistance provided?
FAQs.answer: Visa services are not directly provided. However, we offer guidance via Support team.

FAQs.question: Can I reschedule my flight free of cost?
FAQs.answer: Free rescheduling depends on the airline's fare rules. Check 'More Info' under your booking.

FAQs.question: How early should I arrive at the airport?
FAQs.answer: It’s recommended to arrive at least 2 hours before a domestic flight and 3 hours before an international flight.

FAQs.question: Can I book a flight without creating an account?
FAQs.answer: No, creating an account is mandatory for managing bookings and support.

FAQs.question: How can I reset my booking password if forgotten?
FAQs.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the steps to reset it.

FAQs.question: Can I get GST input tax credit on flight booking?
FAQs.answer: Yes, if you provide your valid GST number during the booking process.

FAQs.question: Do you provide invoice for canceled bookings?
FAQs.answer: Yes, refund and cancellation invoices are available under 'My Bookings'.

FAQs.question: What if I selected wrong travel class (Economy/Premium)?
FAQs.answer: You can attempt modification if your ticket is flexible or contact Customer Support immediately.

FAQs.question: What should I do if my payment failed?
FAQs.answer: Retry payment or try a different method. Ensure funds are available and card details are correct.

FAQs.question: How to get faster flight check-in?
FAQs.answer: Many airlines allow web check-in via their own websites. We recommend doing it 24 hours prior.

FAQs.question: Can I pay using international cards?
FAQs.answer: Yes, major international Visa, Mastercard, Amex cards are accepted.

FAQs.question: How do I know my booking is confirmed?
FAQs.answer: You will receive an email and SMS confirmation. You can also check under 'My Bookings'.

FAQs.question: What happens if I overpay by mistake?
FAQs.answer: If any duplicate payment happens, our billing team automatically processes a refund within 5-7 working days.

FAQs.question: Can I view fare breakup before paying?
FAQs.answer: Yes, a detailed fare breakdown is shown before you proceed to the payment page.

FAQs.question: Can I book a child ticket without an adult?
FAQs.answer: No, most airlines require a child under 12 to be accompanied by an adult during booking.

FAQs.question: How to check refund status?
FAQs.answer: Check refund status under 'My Bookings' or reach out to Customer Support for an update.

FAQs.question: Can I use multiple promo codes for a single booking?
FAQs.answer: No, only one promo code can be applied per booking.

FAQs.question: How to delete my account?
FAQs.answer: Please reach out to Customer Support to request account deletion after identity verification.

FAQs.question: Can I transfer my flight ticket to another person?
FAQs.answer: Most airlines do not allow transfer of tickets. Contact Support to check if changes are possible.

FAQs.question: Will I be notified if my flight is delayed?
FAQs.answer: Yes, we automatically send SMS and email alerts for delays or schedule changes.

FAQs.question: Can I get a duplicate ticket if I lose mine?
FAQs.answer: Yes, you can download your ticket again from 'My Bookings' anytime.
